basic.blooming: Flowering period June-July, fruiting period September
basic.color: Flower color orange red , fruit color yellow brown

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade, avoid scorching light
maintenance.watering: Likes wet environments, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
